features: Durable, stretchy and breathable recycled polyester/spandex soft-shell fabric with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
Articulated pattern and gusseted crotch enhance movement and comfort under a harness
Low-profile, elasticized, contoured waistband with separating zip fly layers comfortably under a harness or backpack waistbelt
Secure front pockets and thigh pockets sit above the knee and below harness leg loops
Narrow, adjustable lower-leg cuffs and tie-down loops for compatibility with alpine boots
